Name: Develop Specialty
Desc: When you explore <color=#799A31>3</color> or more areas of the same color each day, the corresponding Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+15</color> permanently.

Name: Hoarder
Desc: A random Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+15</color> permanently for <color=#799A31>each</color> item you purchase.

Name: Adventurer
Desc: Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+80</color> for the current area if the area you are currently exploring does not border the last area you explored.

Name: Lucky Star
Desc: For every <color=#799A31>1</color> Empty Area you explore, receive Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+100</color> the next time you explore a Non-Empty Area <size=20><color=#8B8C8C>(reset when triggered)</color></size>.

Name: Emergency Clock Off
Desc: Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+100</color> for the final action of each day.

Name: Committed to Work
Desc: Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+100</color> for the first action of each day.

Name: Master of Promotion
Desc: When a character Star Ups, its Colored Multiplier + <color=#799A31>(number of Star Ups x3)</color>

Name: Superstar
Desc: Tri-Color Multiplier will increase during tally based on the ★ of the character with the highest ★ rating \n<size=20><color=#8B8C8C>(Next Day Reset)</color></size>.

Name: Powerful Reinforcements
Desc: Corresponding Colored Multiplier of the character <color=#799A31>+1</color> when you recruit a new character.

Name: Bounty Notice
Desc: Colored Resource doubles in the area occupied by the enemy.

Name: Straight Line Plan I
Desc: Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+60</color> when today's explored area includes the <Icon=Img1/> shape.

Name: City Architect
Desc: Receive Tri-Colored Resource equal to the number of Build/Modification performed today <color=#799A31>x60</color>.

Name: Inflation
Desc: Get a <color=#FF7800>x3</color> tally bonus that decreases by <color=#FF7800>0.5</color> daily until it reaches <color=#FF7800>1</color>.

Name: Exchange Rate Disorder
Desc: Randomly get a <color=#FF7800>x0</color>-<color=#FF7800>x4</color> tally bonus during tally \n<size=20><color=#8B8C8C>(Next Day Reset)</color></size>.

Name: Destroyer
Desc: Get a <color=#FF7800>x0.5</color> tally bonus each time you destroy a Blueprint.

Name: Watchtower Specialty
Desc: Get a <color=#FF7800>x0.3</color> tally bonus every time you use a Watchtower to clear an enemy area.

Name: Union
Desc: Get a <color=#FF7800>x0.5</color> tally bonus for every Blueprint you own during tally \n<size=20><color=#8B8C8C>(Next Day Reset)</color></size>.

Name: Balanced Growth
Desc: Get a <color=#FF7800>x0.4</color> tally bonus if you explore 3 or more different colored areas each day.

Name: Big Buyer
Desc: Get a <color=#FF7800>x0.6</color> tally bonus for each item you purchase <size=20><color=#8B8C8C>(Resets after moving to a new area)</color></size>.

Name: Mysterious Business Card
Desc: <color=#799A31>+1</color> bonus recruitment attempts for every Recruitment Voucher.

Name: Energy Supply Pack
Desc: Action Point of the Day <color=#799A31>+1</color>

Name: Allocation Order
Desc: Receive <color=#799A31>one</color> 2★ Recruitment Voucher every <color=#799A31>3</color> days.

Name: Random Sale
Desc: <color=#799A31>1</color> random product column will be free when you enter a new shop\n (this<size=20><color=#8B8C8C> effect will disappear once you make a purchase)</color></size>.

Name: Friendship Supply!
Desc: <color=#BC4C4C>-100</color> Silver Coins daily and receive Golden Blueprint once you have <color=#BC4C4C>-500</color> Silver Coins, and increase limit by <color=#799A31>1</color> before this item self-destructs.

Name: Foreign Exchange Trade Agreement
Desc: Receive Silver Coins equal to the number of Construction Permits you own <color=#799A31>x2</color> during tally.

Name: Corner Plan I
Desc: Receive <color=#799A31>40</color> Silver Coins when today's explored area includes the <Icon=Img1/> shape.

Name: Straight Line Plan II
Desc: Receive <color=#799A31>40</color> Silver Coins when today's explored area includes the <Icon=Img1/> shape.

Name: Corner Plan II
Desc: Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+60</color> when today's explored area includes the <Icon=Img1/> shape.

Name: Friendship Supply!
Desc: <color=#BC4C4C>-30</color> Silver Coins daily and receive <color=#799A31>2</color> Blueprints once you have <color=#BC4C4C>-120</color> Silver Coins before this item self-destructs.

Name: Friendship Supply!
Desc: <color=#BC4C4C>-20</color> Silver Coins daily and receive <color=#799A31>one</color> 2★ Recruitment Voucher once you have <color=#BC4C4C>-60</color> Silver Coins before this item self-destructs.

Name: Action Conversion I
Desc: Receive Tri-Colored Multiplier equal to the number of remaining Action Points today <color=#799A31>x5</color> during tally.

Name: Corner Plan III
Desc: Get a <color=#FF7800>x0.2</color> tally bonus when today's explored area includes the <Icon=Img1/> shape.

Name: Expert Negotiator
Desc: Get a <color=#FF7800>x0.4</color> tally bonus for each Proxy Battle.

Name: Lucky Gold Coin
Desc: Upgrade all the Recruitment Vouchers in this shop to 2★.

Name: Non-equivalent Substitution
Desc: Colored Resource of the area <color=#BC4C4C>-30</color> and Tri-Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+60</color> during tally.

Name: Action Conversion II
Desc: Receive Silver Coins equal to the number of remaining Action Points today <color=#799A31>x40</color> during tally.

Name: Subject Handling
Desc: Tri-Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+60</color> for <color=#799A31>every</color> Event Area you enter.

Name: Exploration Expert
Desc: Receive <color=#799A31>1</color> Recruitment Voucher for <color=#799A31>every</color> chest you obtain.

Name: Supply Excavation I
Desc: Receive <color=#799A31>two</color> 1★ Registration Forms.

Name: Supply Excavation II
Desc: Receive <color=#799A31>one</color> 3★ Recruitment Voucher.

Name: Diversify Multipliers
Desc: When you explore <color=#799A31>3</color> or more differently colored areas each day, the corresponding Colored Multiplier <color=#799A31>+1</color> permanently.

Name: Diversify Resource
Desc: When you explore <color=#799A31>3</color> or more differently colored areas each day, the corresponding Colored Resource <color=#799A31>+6</color> permanently.

Name: Coordinates
Desc: The unresolvable effect holds\n<size=24><color=#74797D>a special code of mysterious coordinates, with its calculation and verification remaining an unsolved mystery.</color></size>

Name: Silver Talisman
Desc: During result calculation, each Action Point will be converted to <color=#799A31>100 Silver Coins</color>

Name: Special Watchtower
Desc: In the Chilly Wind Valley, you can only use <color=#799A31>Sentry Towers</color> to kill enemies.\n\n<size=24><color=#74797D>Sentry Towers can eliminate all enemies nearby and deal damage equal to 30% of current HP to the Boss.</color></size>

Name: The Queen's Curse
Desc: In the lost Silver City, you can only spend Silver Coins to kill enemies through Proxy Battle.
